description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=1/3, Mature Content=1/3. Armed with an ancient sword and her gift of telekinesis, Susan is forced to enter a nightmare world. Using her powers, move blocks to change the environment to create new platforms and foil enemies.
description.short: Armed with an ancient sword and her gift of telekinesis, Susan is forced to enter a nightmare world. Using her powers, move blocks to change the environment to create new platforms and foil enemies.
